hero.name: Cody Rose
hero.about: I'm an Austin-based developer who loves contributing to open source software and building beautiful, challenging, and efficient websites with React and Typescript. I'm trying my best to learn as much as I can and share what I learn with others.

projects.intro: I keep a running list of ideas and enjoy contributing to open source, so I always have a project in the works. Here are a few of my favorites

list.title: Hasty Hops
list.description: Search for beers to view their info and ratings.

list.title: HospitalRun
list.description: Open source contribution to convert 700+ tests from Enzyme to React Testing Library.

list.title: Expense Tracker
list.description: A web app for expense tracking with user authentication.

list.title: Breath of the Wild Cooking
list.description: A tool create dishes based on the BotW cooking system.

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.intro: I'm currently looking for a remote full-time React Engineer position. If you know of any feel free to reach out!
